page.shortlink: api inet namespace socket class read line method
page.description: The INET::Socket::ReadLine() method reads a line from the receive buffer. A line is terminated by a carriage-return and a line feed. If nothing is available, the method returns an empty string.
page.prototype: Result_Flag as L = ReadLine(Data BYREF as C[, Timeout as N = -1])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: Data
argument.description: The data received from the connection.

argument.name: Timeout
argument.description: The time (in milliseconds) to wait for a complete line of data to be received.
